description: AbstractSurfaceData is the abstract superclass for different kinds of textures and material.

properties.name: objectId
properties.description: Specifies the identifier of the surface data that is unique within the database. Using a globally unique identifier is recommended.

properties.name: identifier
properties.description: Specifies an optional identifier of the surface data that is globally unique.

properties.name: codeSpace
properties.description: Specifies the code space of the identifier, typically a reference to the maintaining authority.

properties.name: isFront
properties.description: Indicates whether the texture or material is assigned to the front side or the back side of the surface geometry object.
